name: terraformer
description: A geographic toolkit for dealing with geometry, geography, formats, and building geodatabases

scripts.docs:serve: npm run jsdoc && http-server & onchange -v 'packages/**/*.js' -- npm run jsdoc
scripts.test:chrome: browserify packages/**/test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] --debug | tape-run --browser chrome | faucet
scripts.test:firefox: browserify packages/**/test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] --debug | tape-run --browser firefox | faucet
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:node
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:electron

author: john gravois
